comment.author: Victoria
comment.text: To my fellow American friends, when you vote, keep in mind that you are not only voting for your country but for the world. So vote, vote, vote, vote that world can survive :) With <3 from Bangladesh.

replies.author: Jeremiah
replies.text: You are not my friend. Your country has taken many of our jobs.

replies.author: Victoria
replies.text: oho that's right but, our country can't give jobs many people. because of that many peoples are move usa...they are believe that usa is best country for job....and usa all are so friendly...

replies.author: Victoria
replies.text: and also you need to know, for going to usa they need to pay 23000$ to 30000$...
